section.section:
A local department may pay the reasonable funeral expenses of a decedent who was a:
recipient of public assistance, including temporary cash assistance or public assistance to adults; or
State resident receiving Supplemental Security Income under Title XVI of the Social Security Act.
The funeral expenses paid by the local department may not exceed $900.

text.section:
A local department may not pay funeral expenses under this section unless:
each person legally responsible for the support of the decedent is unable to pay the expenses; and
other resources, including available death benefits of the estate, are insufficient to pay the expenses.
Payments provided in accordance with this section shall be charged to State funds.
